titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 479) to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for enforcement of clause 9 of rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Boehner. Petition No: 110-2. (Discharge petition text with signatures.)

bill.summary:
7/19/2007--Introduced.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 479) to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for enforcement of clause 9 of rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.
